name: Above Clouds VR
description:
In a future where machines take over the universe, you must fight drones before they kill you.

This game is compatible with WebXR devices (Valve Index, Oculus Quest 1,2, etc.).

Instructions

You fight using a staff, the green marks at the center are your life count.

If you hit a drone using the top or bottom part of your staff the drone is damaged.

If you hit a drone using the body of your staff you will push the drone away but no damage is caused.
